Text.val: @@CREATED: 05.01.12 AS
Retrieves and processes incoming payments from IBOL WS
05.11.2013 AS SCR#18488,17601 using old .ini seetings from SCR#17601
04.06.2013 AS, SCR#18140 changed alphanumeric parameters to Alpha to avoid cross-platform problems
06.06.2012 AS SCR#17376 added parameter po.reportid_reply which gets value from response xml
18.04.2012 AS SCR#17259 prefixing filename of response with current date/time
26.01.2012 AS, SCR#17077 using new function 'mging.mging_postfile_ct' to set content type and encoding of request
error codes and description ...
error#4 BWSR row does not exist ....
prepare temp. files ....
delete temp. files if they already exists ....
generate request xml (message) ....
error#1 failed to create (outgoing) message ...
build command line for the signature utility ...
invoke signature utility ....
error#2 failed to sign outgoing message ......
send request to IBOL webservice ....
sending of message succeeded. Handle response .....
The response we do get does not have a XML header (<?xml ... ). For that reason we do add one here, otherwise uniPaaS won't
be able to read that file. Note that we do set the encoding to Windows-1250. Thats what IBOL actually returns and this at the
moment is matter of disussion. It would be much better and future safe if we could use UTF-8 here.
check reponse for error ....
move file to new/handled ....
error#3 failed to send message to IBOL server
